title: Moonclan cape

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Moonclan cape is part of the Moonclan robes set. It can be purchased from the clothing store on Lunar Isle during or after Lunar Diplomacy. It is currently the only cape to have a negative defence and attack bonus for any style. It can be stored in a magic wardrobe in a player owned house.

Item ID9074

The Moonclan cape is part of the Moonclan robes set. It can be purchased from the clothing store on Lunar Isle during or after Lunar Diplomacy. It is currently the only cape to have a negative defence and attack bonus for any style. It can be stored in a magic wardrobe in a player owned house.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0+2-2
 Defence bonuses
+0+1+1+2-2
 Other bonusesSlot

[[File:Moonclan cape detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''Moonclan cape''' is part of the [[Moonclan robes]] set. It can be purchased from the clothing store on [[Lunar Isle]] during or after [[Lunar Diplomacy]]. It is currently the only cape to have a negative defence and attack bonus for any style. It can be stored in a [[magic wardrobe]] in a player owned house.
